SIC "As you have chosen automated biometric identity verification for authentication method, please read the following conditions very carefully and proceed only if you have fully understood and agreed with the conditions. If you do not agree with the processing of your biometric personal data (your facial image) and the making of automated decisions based on this data for identification purposes, please choose another authentication method for registration. Please be aware that you have the right to withdraw your consent at any time. Note that as trust service provider we are under legal obligation to store your personal data within the period prescribed in the law. - I confirm that I am at least 18 years old. - I confirm that mobile-id may process my biometric personal data (facial image) and carry out automated decision-making based on this data to identify me for remote signing account registion purposes. - I confirm that mobile-id may perform verification based on my biometric personal data in order to ensure the security of my electronic identity and test the quality of the technical solutions that are used. Should you have any questions relating to the processing of your personal data, please do not hesitate to contact us. Mobile-id technologies and service jsc (data controller, hereafter mobile-id). Address: 19 Dang Tien Dong Street, An Phu ward, district 2, Ho Chi Minh city, Vietnam. Tax code: 0313994173 Email: info@mobile-id.vn Hotline: 1900 6884 " Terms and conditions for use of certificates of qualified remote signing I agree that my personal data which I have presented is used for generating my remote signing account and certificates. I agree that my remote signing account and certificates are used to identify me in e-services and in electronic signatures. I am aware that by entering my pincode/tapping my fingerytip either for authentication of for creating electronic signatures. - I verify that I have initiated a session, agree with it and that I am responsible for its conesequences. - I verify that I have made sure that the verification code sent to me, is correct. - I allow my name and personal code to be sent to the e-service provider. I am also aware that if I have lost my device or my pincodes have become known to third parties, I am obliged to immediately revoke my remote signing certificates. Information on deleting remote signing account or revocation of the certificates is available at https://rssp.mobile-id.vn I am aware that use of the remote signing application is described in the remote signing end-user license agreement. Full version of the terms and conditions on the use of the remote signing certificates is available at https://rssp.mobile-id.vn/term Full version of the end-user license agreement is available at https://rssp.mobile-id.vn/faq I am aware that by choosing 'I agree' I confirm that i am familiar and agree with the terms and conditions on the use of remote signing certificates and with the remote signing end-user license agreement. Consent to process personal data via automated biometric identity verification How can we reach you? Please enter your Phone Number and Email Address in case we need to contact you Phone Number Email Address ENTER Activation Code sent to your phone You don't have any account? Register now Consent to process personal data via automated biometric identity verification As you have chosen automated biometric identity verification for authentication method, please read the following conditions very carefully and proceed only if you have fully understood and agreed with the conditions. 

If you do not agree with the processing of your biometric personal data (your facial image) and the making of automated decisions based on this data for identification purposes, please choose another authentication method for registration. 

Please be aware that you have the right to withdraw your consent at any time. note that as trust service provider we are under legal obligation to store your personal data within the period prescribed in the law no. screenshot description.

- I confirm that i am at least 18 years old

- I confirm that mobile-id may process my biometric personal data (facial image) and carry out automated decision-making based on this data to identify me for remote signing account registion purposes.

 - I confirm that mobile-id may perform verification based on my biometric personal data in order to ensure the security of my electronic identity and test the quality of the technical solutions that are used.

Should you have any questions relating to the processing of your personal data, please do not hesitate to contact us.

Mobie-id technologies and service jsc (data controller, hereafter "mobile-id").

Address: 19 dang tien dong street, an phu ward, district 2, ho chi minh city, vietnam.

Tax code: 0313994173

Email: info@mobile-id.vn

Hotline: 1900 6884 I agree that my personal data which i have presented is used for generating my remote signing account and certificates.i agree that my remote signing account and certificates are used to identify me in e-services and in electronic signatures.

 I am aware that by entering my pincode/tapping my fingerytip either for authentication of for creating electronic signatures.

 - I verify that i have initiated a session, agree with it and that i am responsible for its conesequences.

 - I verify that i have made sure that the verification code sent to me, is correct.

 - I allow my name and personal code to be sent to the e-service provider i am also aware that if i have lost my device or my pincodes have become known to third parties, i am obliged to immediately revoke my remot signing ceritificates.

 Information on deleting remote signing account or revocation of the certificates is available at https://rssp.mobile-id.vn 

 I am aware that use of the remote signing application is described in the remote signing end-user license agreement.

 Full version of the terms and conditions on the use of the remote signing certificates is available at https://rssp.mobile-id.vn/terms 

 Full version of the end-user license agreement is available at https://rssp.mobile-id.vn/privacy 

 I am aware that by choosing 'i agree' i confirm that i am familiar and agree with the terms and conditions on the use of remote signing certificates and with the remote signing end-user license agreement.

© 2016- RSSP is part of MOBILE-ID™ Please e-mail us at info@mobile-id.vn DIDN'T FIND WHAT YOU WERE LOOKING FOR? FAQ • What is RSSP?
• What can RSSP do?
• What makes RSSP better than username and password?
• Does RSSP use and store my existing usernames and passwords?
• What is required to use RSSP?
• What services can I link to RSSP?
• What browsers does RSSP support?
• Didn't find what you were looking for? WHAT IS RSSP? RSSP is a global security service providing sign in and online transaction security for online services. End users use the service with RSSP keys, which comes as a smartphone app or a USB key. The users can manage their RSSP keys using the RSSP website. RSSP user can have multiple RSSP apps and keys on his account, and lock lost apps and keys to prevent misuse. Some services might integrate RSSP keys into their own apps or provide branded USB keys. WHAT CAN RSSP DO? RSSP can prevent unauthorized use of usernames and passwords. The so called 2-step verification or 2-factor authentication verifies the user during login. Similarly RSSP can prevent unauthorized transactions or user account changes by verifying the user real-time when transactions happen. Some services also allow their users to use RSSP to sign in without passwords at all, providing the greatest level of user convenience.
The service providers can select their own policies and offer the user verification operations like:
 • Verify user when they sign in from new IP or device
 • Verify user when they change their account
 • Verify user every time they login
 • Verify transactions (purchase, sell, trade, etc)
 • Allow login without a password
 • Allow easy new user registration with RSSP WHAT MAKES RSSP BETTER THAN USERNAME AND PASSWORD? Usernames and passwords are hard to manage, insecure and there's just too many of them. Single sign-on services based on username and password don't really fix the security issues. Storing your usernames and passwords into a central storage still leaves you vulnerable to the phishing attacks.
RSSP does not use or store usernames and passwords. We believe that any solution based on usernames and passwords is obsolete, difficult to use and too easy to break.
RSSP is based on Public Key Infrastructure (PKI). This is a similar system which governments and big enterprises use to maximize secure authentication of their closed services. RSSP does the same in the public internet.
RSSP makes passwords obsolete. Each RSSP app has a private key identifying the device. You control the access to the app with your chosen pin code. You are authenticated with something you have and with the one optional secret you remember. If your RSSP device is lost or stolen, lock the app at RSSP website. DOES RSSP USE AND STORE MY EXISTING USERNAMES AND PASSWORDS? No, RSSP does not use or store any of your usernames and passwords. Further, RSSP itself does not require username and password. RSSP stands for zero passwords. WHAT IS REQUIRED TO USE RSSP? RSSP app is available for iOS and Android devices. You don't need any specific software for the PC or Mac.
Since we do not rely on usernames and passwords, even public computers can be used safely. WHAT SERVICES CAN I LINK TO RSSP? RSSP works with services who integrate to our backend. Those services typically promote RSSP at their login page and in the user settings, where the actual linking of your RSSP key takes place. WHAT BROWSERS DOES RSSP SUPPORT? RSSP supports the following browsers:
 • Windows OS:
 • IE9+
 • Firefox latest releases
 • Chrome latest releases
 • Safari latest releases
 • Mac OS X:
 • Firefox latest releases
 • Chrome latest releases
 • Safari latest releases
 • We also have a limited, alpha stage support for certain Linux distributions.
Effective as of May 28, 2020. Last revised May 28, 2020. 1. ACCEPTANCE OF TERMS OF SERVICES MOBILE-ID (“Services”) is an authentication and authorization Internet service owned and operated by MOBILE-ID Technologies And Services Joint Stock Company ("MOBILE-ID™"), a Vietnamese limited liability company. The Services are provided to you ("Member") under the terms and conditions of this RSSP Terms of Services (“TOS”) and the Privacy Policy (see below in Section 4).

BY COMPLETING THE INSTALLATION, ACTIVATION OR REGISTRATION PROCESS, OR BY USING THE SERVICES, YOU EXPRESSLY INDICATE YOUR AGREEMENT TO BE BOUND BY ALL OF THE TERMS AND CONDITIONS OF THIS TOS AND THE PRIVACY POLICY. IF YOU DO NOT AGREE TO THE TERMS AND CONDITIONS OF THIS TOS OR PRIVACY POLICY, YOU MAY NOT USE THE SERVICES.

MOBILE-ID™may change the provisions in the TOS from time to time. Any changes in the TOS will be communicated to the Members by posting to MOBILE-ID site in reasonable time in advance. By continuing the use of the Services constitutes an affirmative acknowledgment by you of the TOS and TOS modifications and an agreement by you to abide and be bound by the TOS and TOS modifications. 2. DESCRIPTION OF SERVICES The Services enable the Members to authenticate themselves to multiple third party Internet services in a secure manner. Third party Internet services are provided by their respective providers; MOBILE-ID™ only provides single-sign-on to these third party services.

The Services are provided through MOBILE-ID site. The Services may be used by mobile phone and other consumer electronics devices provided that the Member provisions a RSSP client software program available from MOBILE-ID web site or from other distribution channels. The Services may also be used by purchasing a USB peripheral from MOBILE-ID™ or third party distributor. For ease of use, the Member may create a link to RSSP widget or install a RSSP extension into his web browser.

The basic service may be provided free of charge. The Member may also subscribe to a premium version of the Services for a subscription fee (“RSSP Premium Service”).

Member must provide all equipment, including a PC or mobile phone, necessary to establish a connection to the Internet and provide for own access to the Internet and pay any fees and prices associated with such equipment and access.

Please note that the process of subscription to the RSSP Premium Services or the purchase of USB peripheral may include you to accept additional terms and conditions towards MOBILE-ID™ or third parties. 3. MODIFICATIONS TO SERVICES MOBILE-ID™ reserves the right to modify the Services at any time with or without notice to Member. MOBILE-ID™ shall not be liable to Member or any third party should MOBILE-ID™ modify the Services. Any material changes in the Services will be communicated to the Members by posting to MOBILE-ID site in reasonable time in advance. 4. PRIVACY POLICY All information entered into the Services by a Member is private to such Member. MOBILE-ID™ does not approve or verify any information entered in the Services by the Members but each Member is responsible for the information he/she provides to the Services.

MOBILE-ID™ fully respects the privacy of the Members and agrees to use, disclose or transfer the personal information of the Members only in accordance with the terms and conditions specified in the Privacy Policy available at MOBILE-ID site and annexed to this TOS document.

By accepting this TOS, you give your express acceptance for the use, disclosure and transfer of your personal information stored in the Services in accordance with the Privacy Policy. 5. LICENSE TO SOFTWARE MOBILE-ID™ gives you a personal, non-transferable and non-exclusive license to use the RSSP client software and/or the software used in RSSP widget and browser extension (“Software”) only in connection with the use of the Services. This license is for the sole purpose of enabling you to use and enjoy the benefit of the Services as provided by MOBILE-ID™. The license will terminate upon the termination of your right to use the Services.

You may not (and you may not permit anyone else to) copy, modify, create a derivative work of, reverse engineer, decompile or otherwise attempt to extract the source code of the Software or any part thereof, unless this is expressly permitted or required by law. 6. MEMBER ACCOUNTS, CREDENTIALS AND SECURITY Once you become a Member, you shall receive credentials (provisioned to your USB peripheral, client software or other client by MOBILE-ID™, as well as a related PIN code, unlock code or other authentication mechanisms provided by MOBILE-ID™) and an account to access and use the Services. You may change your PIN code at any time (to do so, follow instructions on RSSP clients or MOBILE-ID site); you may also set up a new account and close an old one at your convenience. Member agrees to immediately notify MOBILE-ID™ of any unauthorized use of Member's account or any other breach of security known to Member.

If a USB peripheral or a device with RSSP client software is lost by you, your personal data may be at risk, and cannot be recovered by MOBILE-ID™. Furthermore, you are entirely responsible for any and all activities which occur under your account.

Please see the Privacy Policy for more information about the use of the credentials and the confidentiality of your private information. 7. RECOMMENDATIONS AND PROMOTIONS From time to time RSSP may recommend or promote new services to the Members. The manner, mode and extent of promotions on MOBILE-ID site and software are subject to change. Your correspondence or business dealings with, or participation in promotions of, service providers found on or through the Service, including payment and delivery of related goods or services, and any other terms, conditions, warranties or representations associated with such dealings, are solely between you and such service provider. 8. USE OF COOKIES AND 3RD PARTY SOFTWARE RSSP uses cookies to identify and maintain valid sessions. No personal data of the Members is stored into the cookies. You may configure your web browser to notify you when you receive a new cookie or you can disable the use of cookies altogether. Disabling the use of cookies altogether may prevent you from using some or all of the essential features of the Services. Please also note that RSSP service and application includes third party materials that are subject to a separate license. Those materials are specified in a Third Party Notices document which may either be posted on this site and/or included in the ReadMe file or Documentation for the applicable product. RSSP application currently uses the following 3rd party open source libraries: \u2022 ASIHTTPRequest (licence) \u2022 TouchJSON (licence) 9. TERMINATION Unless otherwise agreed, MOBILE-ID™ may discontinue the Services and remove and discard any information within the Services at any time and for any reason, by providing one (1) month prior notice posted to the MOBILE-ID site, or with immediate effect in case that you have violated or breached the provisions of this TOS. 10. MEONTRUST PROPRIETARY RIGHTS You acknowledge and agree that the Services and the Software used in connection with the Services are proprietary and confidential information of MOBILE-ID™ or its licensors and are protected by applicable intellectual property and other laws.

MOBILE-ID™ is also owner of trade names, trademarks or domain names MOBILE-ID™ and RSSP™. You may not use or register those names or any confusingly similar names as trademarks, trade names or domain names without a consent from MOBILE-ID™. 11. DISCLAIMER OF WARRANTIES YOU EXPRESSLY AGREE THAT USE OF THE SERVICES IS AT YOUR SOLE RISK. THE SERVICES ARE PROVIDED ON AN "AS IS" AND "AS AVAILABLE" BASIS.

MOBILE-ID EXPRESSLY DISCLAIMS ALL WARRANTIES OF ANY KIND, WHETHER EXPRESS OR IMPLIED, INCLUDING, BUT NOT LIMITED TO THE IMPLIED WARRANTIES OF MERCHANTABILITY, FITNESS FOR A PARTICULAR PURPOSE AND NON-INFRINGEMENT.

MOBILE-ID MAKES NO WARRANTY THAT THE SERVICES WILL MEET YOUR REQUIREMENTS, OR THAT THE SERVICES WILL BE UNINTERRUPTED, TIMELY, SECURE, OR ERROR FREE; NOR DOES IT MAKE ANY WARRANTY RELATING TO THE CONTENT OR FUNCTIONING OF THIRD PARTY INTERNET SERVICES OR AS TO THE ACCURACY OR RELIABILITY OF ANY INFORMATION OBTAINED THROUGH THE SERVICES OR THAT DEFECTS IN THE SOFTWARE WILL BE CORRECTED.

SOME JURISDICTIONS DO NOT ALLOW THE EXCLUSION OF CERTAIN WARRANTIES, SO SOME OF THE ABOVE EXCLUSIONS MAY NOT APPLY TO YOU. 12. LIMITATION OF LIABILITY MOBILE-ID SHALL NOT BE LIABLE FOR ANY DIRECT, INDIRECT, INCIDENTAL, SPECIAL OR CONSEQUENTIAL DAMAGES RESULTING FROM THE USE OR THE INABILITY TO USE THE SERVICES, EVEN IF IT HAS BEEN ADVISED OF THE POSSIBILITY OF SUCH DAMAGES.

MOBILE-ID SHALL NEITHER BE LIABLE FOR ANY COSTS OR DAMAGES ARISING OUT OF DESTRUCTION, LOSS OR ALTERATION OF THE INFORMATION OR DATA STORED IN THE SERVICES.

SOME JURISDICTIONS DO NOT ALLOW THE LIMITATION OR EXCLUSION OF LIABILITY IN RESPECT OF CERTAIN DAMAGES SO SOME OF THE ABOVE LIMITATIONS MAY NOT APPLY TO YOU. 13. INDEMNITY You agree to indemnify and hold MOBILE-ID™ harmless from any claim or demand made by a third party due to or arising out of or related to your violation or breach of the provisions on this TOS or your violation of any laws, regulations or third party rights. 14. NOTICE TO THOSE UNDER 18 YEARS OLD If you are under 18 years old, you may use the Services and provide your personal information to the Services only provided that

(i) you have informed your guardians of the use and content of the Services;

(ii) your guardians have given their consent to your use of the Services. 15. GOVERNING LAW These TOS shall be governed by and construed in accordance with the laws of Vietnam, excluding its conflict of law provisions. 16. MISCELLANEOUS This TOS together with the Privacy Policy constitute the entire agreement between you and MOBILE-ID™ and govern your use of the Services and Software. If any provision of this TOS is found by a court of competent jurisdiction to be invalid or unenforceable, such invalidity or enforceability shall not in any manner affect or render invalid or unenforceable the remaining provisions of the TOS and the application of those provisions shall be enforced to the extent permitted by law. MOBILE-ID™ may assign this TOS or any part of it without restrictions. You may not assign this TOS or any part of it to any third party. 17. GENERAL INFORMATION The Services are provided by MOBILE-ID Digital Signature Certification Service Center, a Vietnamese limited liability company registered in the National Board of Patents and Registration in Vietnam with the business identity code 0313994173, having its registered place of business at 19 Dang Tien Dong, An Phu Ward, Thu Duc City, Ho Chi Minh City

Please contact us at: info@mobile-id.vn

Copyright © MOBILE-ID Digital Signature Certification Service Center All rights reserved
MOBILE-ID PRIVACY POLICY
MOBILE-ID is an authentication and authorization service, enabling the end-users to authenticate themselves to multiple Internet services in a secure manner. A USB peripheral ("RSSP key") or a client software program, activated by a user and device specific PIN code, is used by end-users to manage their accounts in a centralized but secure manner.

No disclosure of personal data of any kind (such as name, age, location, face data) is necessary to use MOBILE-ID when the service is only used to manage end-user's access credentials for Internet services. The end-user's username and password information related to an Internet service are not stored in MOBILE-ID although a list of the Internet services accessible by certain RSSP account is stored. When MOBILE-ID is used in the manner described above, the information concerning RSSP keys or accounts cannot be directly linked to any particular person.

MOBILE-ID provides end-users an option to store personal data in their RSSP keys and software clients. End-users may store personal data that may be necessary for using some Internet services, for example to verify to an Internet service that the end-user is of a certain age. All personal data disclosed by an end-user is stored permanently only in the end-user's RSSP key or software client and is disclosed to an Internet service only upon a query from the service and only with an express consent of the end-user for each query separately. Temporary processing of the end-user's personal data by MOBILE-ID is necessary when the end-user discloses or edits the personal data stored in the RSSP key or software client, or when end-user data is disclosed to an Internet service. The data is always discarded without delay after being processed and is not stored by MOBILE-ID in any other place than the end-user's RSSP key or software client.

An end-user may choose to disclose optional personal data (such as an e-mail address or a phone number) to be used by MOBILE-ID for the purposes of communication between the end-user and MOBILE-ID.

Any data concerning the use by a specific end-user of different Internet services via MOBILE-ID may only be stored in and used by MOBILE-ID or MOBILE-ID™ for the purpose of fraud detection or other similar purposes, and to compile an end-user specific trust index which it may provide to third parties upon their request without obtaining a separate consent from the end-user. The trust index is only a technical attribute which cannot be reduced to personal information relating to any private person.

Personal end-user data stored in MOBILE-ID may be transferred within MOBILE-ID to any server in any country worldwide. MOBILE-ID™ always protects any personal data by using adequate data security procedures and technologies. The core principle of MOBILE-ID is to store all personal data (except of the above mentioned optional contact information) in a decentralized manner into the RSSP keys and/or software clients, which are at the sole possession and control of the end-users themselves. Thus the protection by each end-user of the RSSP key or software client and the associated PIN code is the key aspect of the protection of the personal data stored in MOBILE-ID. If a RSSP key or a device with RSSP client software is lost by an end-user, the end-user's personal data may be at risk, and cannot be recovered by MOBILE-ID™. It is essential that end-user has a copy of her unlock code, which can be used to revoke and lock lost RSSP key or software client. MOBILE-ID™ is not responsible for end-users' data or the authenticity thereof in any way, except that MOBILE-ID™ undertakes to use adequate data security procedures and technologies during the processing of the end-users' data. MOBILE-ID™ shall not be liable for any damages caused by inaccurate end-user data or the loss of any end-user data.

MOBILE-ID™ shall not use, store or disclose the end-user's personal data in any other manner than what has been described herein without the consent of the end-user. Any personal data disclosed to MOBILE-ID that is not automatically destroyed immediately after processing shall be destroyed without undue delay after the end-user finally ceases to use MOBILE-ID. The end-user is responsible for destroying data stored in the RSSP key or software clients.

An end-user shall hereby expressly consent to the collection and processing of personal data before using MOBILE-ID. Consent to collect and process personal data may be revoked by the end-user at any time, but use of MOBILE-ID must be discontinued after such revocation. An end-user may inspect and amend the personal data stored into MOBILE-ID at any time by using tools provided at MOBILE-ID web site or by using the contact information below. Please note that MOBILE-ID™ does not have implicit access to the information stored into the end-users' RSSP keys or software clients.

MOBILE-ID is operated by MOBILE-ID Digital Signature Certification Service Center ("MOBILE-ID™"),
Address: 19 Dang Tien Dong, An Phu Ward, Thu Duc City, Ho Chi Minh City
Please contact info@mobile-id.vn in any matters relating to this Privacy Policy.
